title: Publish the current draft to production

requirements.text: Publish (promote) the currently deployed draft build as the production version, without making any code or configuration changes.
acceptanceCriteria: The production deployment completes successfully using the exact same artifact as the current draft (no new build changes).
After publishing, the production URL/canister serves the same UI/behavior as the draft that was approved.
No backend schema/state migrations are introduced as part of publishing.

constraints: Do not modify application features, UI, backend logic, or data models as part of this request (publish-only).
Do not introduce a migration (backend/migration.mo) for a publish-only action.
nonGoals: Adding new features or changing existing functionality before publishing.
Changing styling/theme as part of the publish step.
